description:
A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, an organization whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chikyuu Houkai no Yokan? Nazo no Shin Senshi Shutsugen
El comienzo de la nueva batalla
Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear
地球崩壊の予感? 謎の新戦士出現
